reports.name: Consent Codes
reports.query_statement: select s.external_id,s.kf_id, b.dbgap_consent_code, count(b.*) from biospecimen b join participant p on b.participant_id = p.kf_id join study s on p.study_id = s.kf_id group by s.external_id,s.kf_id, b.dbgap_consent_code order by s.kf_id, b.dbgap_consent_code
